author: rbowen
msg: For the moment, that same rule appears over here in the rewrite
directory, too. We really need to consolidate the mod_rewrite guides a
little more, so that there's not this duplication.

author: rbowen
msg: The [uge] in this rule seems to be a reference to other rules elsewhere
in the guide, but in this context, it's just confusing. I assume that
Ralf just copied rules out of his config files on his own servers, and
they made sense in that context.

author: markt
msg: Remove a JDK 1.4 dep for the few users that still run TC4 on 1.3 JDKs

author: aidan
msg: QPID-1117 : Added tests for all other message types. Refactored the common parts out of the objectTest.

author: dag
msg: DERBY-48 A connection request that has a default schema that is being created by another transaction will fail to connect
Patch derby-48b, which limits the use of a subtransaction to the
initial default schema, other implicit schema creation is
transactional. A new testcase is added to show the latter.
